page.title: 16CAKE BAKING IN CRANTOCK
page.content: {Cake Baking and Decorating:}Cakes baked for friends, weddings, Christen- ings and other occasions are usually special. They are very rich fruit cakes with lots of sultanas, raisins and cherries and sometimes they have Brandy in them. They are covered in marzipan and icing which is made with special sugars and egg-whites. This stiff white icing is piped to decorate the cake and some wedding cakes have 2 or 3 tiers, like a tower. {Stamp- {Collecting:}One man has been collect- ing stamps for 47 years. {Painting: Another person uses oil paints to paint pictures of local places. He has been an artist for 10 years.
